items.todoItem: Know that to judge others is to condemn yourself.
Know that God’s judgement is true.
Don’t think that you will escape the judgement of God.
Know that the goodness of God leads you to repentance.
Know that God will render to every man according to his deeds.
Know that there is no respect of persons with God.
Know that it is not the hearers but the doers of the law that are justified before God.
